00144 int nfs_Rmdir( nfs_arg_t               * parg    /* IN  */,
00145                exportlist_t            * pexport /* IN  */,
00146                fsal_op_context_t             * pcontext   /* IN  */,
00147                cache_inode_client_t    * pclient /* IN  */,
00148                hash_table_t            * ht      /* INOUT */,
00149                struct svc_req          * preq    /* IN  */,
00150                nfs_res_t               * pres    /* OUT */ ) 
00151 {
00152   cache_entry_t          * parent_pentry = NULL ;
00153   cache_entry_t          * pentry_child  = NULL ;
00154   fsal_attrib_list_t       pre_parent_attr      ;
00155   fsal_attrib_list_t       parent_attr          ;
00156   fsal_attrib_list_t     * ppre_attr            ;
00157   fsal_attrib_list_t       pentry_child_attr    ;
00158   cache_inode_file_type_t  filetype             ;
00159   cache_inode_file_type_t  childtype            ;
00160   cache_inode_status_t     cache_status         ; 
00161   int                      rc                   ;
00162   fsal_path_t              symlink_data         ;
00163   char                   * file_name            ;
00164   fsal_name_t              name ;
00165   char                   * dir_name = NULL;
00166   
00167         if (preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3)
00168         {
00169                 /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00170                 pres->res_rmdir3.RMDIR3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc.before.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00171                 pres->res_rmdir3.RMDIR3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc.after.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00172                 ppre_attr = NULL;
00173         }
00174 
00175         /* Convert file handle into a pentry */
00176   if( ( parent_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00177                                             &(parg->arg_rmdir2.dir),
00178                                             &(parg->arg_rmdir3.object.dir),
00179                                             NULL, 
00180                                             &(pres->res_stat2),
00181                                             &(pres->res_rmdir3.status),
00182                                             NULL, 
00183                                             &pre_parent_attr, 
00184                                             pcontext, 
00185                                             pclient, 
00186                                             ht, 
00187                                             &rc ) ) == NULL )
00188      {
00189       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00190        return rc ;
00191      }
00192   
00193         /* get directory attributes before action (for V3 reply) */
00194   ppre_attr = &pre_parent_attr ;
00195   
00196   /* Extract the filetype */
00197   filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( pre_parent_attr.type ) ;
00198 
00199         /*
00200          * Sanity checks: new directory name must be non-null; parent must be
00201          * a directory. 
00202          */
00203   if( filetype != DIR_BEGINNING && filetype != DIR_CONTINUE )
00204         {
00205                 switch( preq->rq_vers )
00206                 {
00207                 case NFS_V2:
00208       pres->res_stat2 = NFSERR_NOTDIR;
00209       break;
00210                 case NFS_V3:
00211       pres->res_rmdir3.status = NFS3ERR_NOTDIR;
00212       break;
00213     }
00214     
00215                 return NFS_REQ_OK;
00216         }
00217   
00218         switch( preq->rq_vers )
00219         {
00220         case NFS_V2:
00221     dir_name = parg->arg_rmdir2.name;
00222     break;
00223     
00224         case NFS_V3:
00225     dir_name = parg->arg_rmdir3.object.name;
00226     break;
00227     
00228         }
00229   
00230         if (dir_name == NULL || strlen(dir_name) == 0)
00231     {
00232       cache_status = CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT;      /* for lack of better... */
00233     } 
00234   else
00235     {
00236       if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_error_convert( FSAL_str2name( dir_name, 
00237                                                                      FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN,
00238                                                                      &name ) ) ) ==  CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00239         {
00240           /*
00241            * Lookup to the entry to be removed to check if it is a directory 
00242            */
00243           if( ( pentry_child = cache_inode_lookup( parent_pentry, 
00244                                                    &name, 
00245                                                    &pentry_child_attr, 
00246                                                    ht, 
00247                                                    pclient, 
00248                                                    pcontext, 
00249                                                    &cache_status ) ) != NULL )
00250             {
00251                /* Extract the filetype */
00252               childtype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( pentry_child_attr.type ) ;
00253 
00254               /*
00255                * Sanity check: make sure we are about to remove a directory 
00256                */
00257               if( childtype != DIR_BEGINNING && childtype != DIR_CONTINUE )
00258                 {
00259                   switch (preq->rq_vers)
00260                     {
00261                     case NFS_V2:
00262                       pres->res_stat2 = NFSERR_NOTDIR;
00263                       break;
00264                       
00265                     case NFS_V3:
00266                       pres->res_rmdir3.status = NFS3ERR_NOTDIR;
00267                       break;
00268                     }
00269                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00270                 }
00271 
00272               /*
00273                * Remove the directory.  Use NULL vnode for the directory
00274                * that's being removed because we know the directory's name. 
00275                */
00276               
00277               if( cache_inode_remove( parent_pentry, 
00278                                       &name, 
00279                                       &parent_attr, 
00280                                       ht, 
00281                                       pclient, 
00282                                       pcontext, 
00283                                       &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00284                 {
00285                   switch (preq->rq_vers)
00286                     {
00287                     case NFS_V2:
00288                       pres->res_stat2 = NFS_OK;
00289                       break;
00290                       
00291                     case NFS_V3:
00292                       /* Build Weak Cache Coherency data */
00293                       nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00294                                       parent_pentry,
00295                                       ppre_attr, 
00296                                       &parent_attr,
00297                                       &(pres->res_rmdir3.RMDIR3res_u.resok.dir_wcc));
00298                       
00299                       pres->res_rmdir3.status = NFS3_OK;
00300                       break;
00301                     }
00302                   return NFS_REQ_OK;
00303                 }
00304             }
00305         }
00306     }
00307   
00308   /* If we are here, there was an error */
00309         if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status ) )
00310     {
00311       return NFS_REQ_DROP;
00312     }
00313   
00314         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00315                        preq->rq_vers, 
00316                        cache_status,
00317                        &pres->res_stat2,
00318                        &pres->res_rmdir3.status,
00319                        NULL, NULL,
00320                        parent_pentry,
00321                        ppre_attr,
00322                        &(pres->res_rmdir3.RMDIR3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc),
00323                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00324 
00325 
00326         return NFS_REQ_OK;
00327 } /* nfs_Rmdir */
00328 
00329 
00338 void nfs_Rmdir_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00339 {
00340   /* Nothing to do here */
00341   return ;
00342 } /* nfs_Rmdir_Free */
